p: HaCaT cells were seeded in 6 well plate at density of 1.5 X 10 5 cells and treated with increasing concentrations of Eczegone (10 ng/mL-100 μg/mL) pursued by incubation for 24 h at 37°C. Afterward, the cells were washed twice with Phosphate Buffered Saline (-ve), fixed with 70% ethanol for 15 minutes and then stained with crystal violet dye (0.5%) for further 1 h. Stained cells were rinsed with tap water and dry at room temperature. The photo of the stained cells were taken by digital scanner.
